name: Library and Museum Treasure Hunt
description:
Welcome to the Library & Museum Treasure Hunt! The objective of this game I desgined is to make it educational, which you may already know the answers to some questions or maybe not. 

Instructions to play: 

Use the up, down, right, & left arrow button on your keyboard to move the avatar or you as the player. 

Meet the cat, Bandit, first, who will give you instructions on what to do next. Click enter or arrow down buttun to get the entire dialogue.

After you completed the library clues, go to the exit arrow button, which will lead you to the next museum, where Bandit will be waiting for you. 

There are a total of three separate rooms to complete before the ending of the game. 

Have fun and enjoy it. 

Jen
